description.summary: OPKG - tiny yet powerful package manager
description.p: Opkg is a lightweight package management system. It is written in C and resembles apt/dpkg in operation. It is intended for use on embedded Linux devices.

Opkg is maintained, stable, robust and conservative in its memory usage. As best it can, opkg maintains backwards compatibility with ipkg and conforms to a subset of Debian's Policy Manual regarding control files.
